ol.li: SHALL conform to Consol General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Allergies Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Hospital Course Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.5)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Plan Of Care Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10)

Contains exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Problem Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.5)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Chief Complaint Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.13.2.1)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Chief Complaint And Reason For Visit Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Discharge Diet Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.33)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Family History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.15)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Functional Status Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.14)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol History Of Present Illness Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.4)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Hospital Discharge Physical Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.26)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Hospital Discharge Studies Summary Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.16)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Procedures Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Reason For Visit Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.12)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Review Of Systems Section (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.18)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.17)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Vital Signs Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4)

Contains zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Immunizations Section Entries Optional (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2)
SHALL conform to Consol General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:5249)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 BasicConfidentialityKind STATIC (CONF:5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 Language DYNAMIC (CONF:5372)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:5266), such that
The recordTarget records the patient whose health information is described by the clinical document; it must contain at least one patientRole element.
MAY contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf (CONF:9955), such that
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:5444), such that
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:5441), such that
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (iv., CONF:5519), such that
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:5565), such that
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:5579), such that
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:5607), such that
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:8001), such that
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] supportParticipant (CONF:10003), such that
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:9952), such that
